WorkPlace.Name: Inwatec
WorkPlace.Description:
Inwatec ApS er en ingeniør- og maskinvirksomhed med fokus på konstruktion og automation.
Inwatec har et kreativt og dynamisk team med meget engagerede medarbejdere, hvor alle taler med og lytter til hinanden. Vi lægger meget stor vægt på samarbejde og vidensdeling på tværs af alle kompetenceområder.
Vores kunder er alt overvejende i vaskeribranchen, hvor vores niche er at gennemføre automatiseringsprojekter, der kan gøre en forretningsmæssig forskel.

Vi har et kreativt og dynamisk team med meget engagerede medarbejdere, hvor alle taler med og lytter til hinanden. Vi lægger meget stor vægt på samarbejde og vidensdeling på tværs af alle kompetenceområder.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Inwatec ApS er en international ingeniør- og maskinvirksomhed med fokus på konstruktion og automation. 
Vi har et kreativt og dynamisk team med meget engagerede medarbejdere, hvor alle taler med og lytter til hinanden. Vi lægger meget stor vægt på samarbejde og vidensdeling på tværs af alle kompetenceområder.
Vores kunder er alt overvejende i vaskeribranchen, hvor vores niche er at gennemføre automatiseringsprojekter, der kan gøre en forretningsmæssig forskel.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you experienced with administrative tasks, skilled in proofing documents and working with word processing software? Do you have the overview and are fast at collecting and understanding documents?

We are looking for a student with strong coordinating and editing skills and preferably experience in administration or projects to assist us for 10-15 hours a week. It is a bonus if you are interested in technical processes, as it will probably make the job easier for you, but it is definitely not a must.

Your Tasks:

  • Updating of multilingual manuals and text-based documentation material for our machines and projects

  • Coordinating and collection of documents for our manuals

  • Administrative tasks within documentation and projects

  • Assisting with smaller video productions for technical tutorials and similar

  • Being creative and open for new projects and and bringing own ideas to life

  • Ad-hoc tasks to support our marketing, sales, and project teams

Qualifications

  • You are currently enrolled in a full-time study program

  • You have a good knowledge of writing and text editing in a fast-paced environment

  • You are a native or excellent English speaker and are good at translating complex processes into a simple language

  • You are good at setting priorities for your tasks

  • You might be familiar with the basics of photography and have experience creating storyboards, filming and editing video clips


INWATEC - THE LAUNDRYNERDS

​Inwatec ApS develops and produces machines for industrial laundries worldwide. Our niche is to implement automation projects that can make a difference for businesses. We are a fast-moving company in rapid development with a dynamic , as well as very dedicated team. We love our informal work environment, where every idea is taken seriously and everybody is treated equally. On Fridays, we meet at our bar for an after-work beer, a barbecue or some ping-pong. We also love training our counter strike skills together for our successful FirmaCS teams after work.

Sounds good? What are you waiting for? Apply now at www.inwatec.dk/job


Find the full job advertisement here.

Upload in PDF
